michael sorens wrote:

> Just the information I needed on source folders in Eclipse! However, I'm  
> having trouble figuring out in Eclipse how to specify separate output  
> folders for each source folder. The help file even has just such a help  
> topic, but the instructions are not quite coherent (to me, anyway). Could  
> someone elucidate?

Right-click your project, choose Properties.
Select Java Build Path.
Select the Source tab.
Check the box "Allow output folders for source folders".
Now select each source folder, press Edit...
Set the output folder for that source folder.
Repeat for all source folders.

Good luck.
